title: 171. Throw Me When I'm Dead
description:
Today we discuss Italian roots, watching Sopranos, Chris thinking he wanted to be in the NBA, funerals, the Butthole song, and we cover something we somehow never covered before: the Christian Bale rant.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
